Keltis: El Camino de las Piedras

Keltis: O Caminho das Pedras
圣石之路 旅行装 (聖石之路 旅行裝)
boardgame.description: In this stand-alone small box _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;travel version_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; of Keltis the familiar rules and forms are mixed with some push-your-luck element. Every turn, players flip a stone tile to its face up side. They have to decide whether they continue a path of stones, or simply leave it at its position. Instead of flipping a new stone tile, players may decide to take one that is already flipped. The larger the path of stones, the more points a player scores. And don't forget to collect wishing stones; otherwise you get a minus score!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: BGTG 101 SR _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Feedback (Dog, Keltis Way of the Stone, Sorry Sliders)
